animeDescription: Based on the Korean Drama of the same name, Yoo Jin falls in love with Joon Sang as a young girl. After losing him in an accident, she decides to marry her childhood friend. However, Yoo Jin meets someone looking exactly like her lost love, putting her in a bind.  The program featured 23 members of the original Korean cast voicing the characters and was broadcast with Japanese subtitles.
animeCharacters: ['Jeong, Yu Jin', 'Lee, Min Hyung', 'Kim, Sang-Hyuk', 'Oh, Chelin']
